H0.text: The 66 mile long Shropshire Union Canal links the city of Wolverhampton to which town situated in Cheshire. Ellesmere Port

H1.text: The 66 mile long Shropshire Union Canal links the city of Wolverhampton to which town situated in Cheshire. Chester

H2.text: The 66 mile long Shropshire Union Canal links the city of Wolverhampton to which town situated in Cheshire. Whitchurch

H3.text: The 66 mile long Shropshire Union Canal links the city of Wolverhampton to which town situated in Cheshire. Netherpool

A4.text: It links the canal system of the West Midlands, at Wolverhampton, with the River Mersey and Manchester Ship Canal at Ellesmere Port, Cheshire, 66 miles (106 km) distant.

A5.text: The Shropshire Union main line runs southeast from Ellesmere Port on the River Mersey to the Staffordshire and Worcestershire Canal at Autherley Junction in Wolverhampton.
